title: The TVLine-Up: What’s Returning, New and Leaving the Week of Nov. 17
description: This weekly feature is in addition to TVLine’s daily What to Watch listings and our monthly breakdown of What’s on Streaming. With over 500 scripted shows now airing across broadcast, cable and streaming, it’s easy to forget that a favorite comedy is returning, or that the new “prestige drama” you anticipated is about to debut. […]
author: Ryan Schwartz
excerpt: Based on a True Story, Night Court, Outlander and The Sex Lives of College Girls return this week. Plus, Cruel Intentions debuts — see full list.
text: This weekly feature is in addition to TVLine’s daily What to Watch listings and our monthly breakdown of What’s on Streaming. With over 500 scripted shows now airing across broadcast, cable and streaming, it’s easy to forget that a favorite comedy is returning, or that the new “prestige drama” you anticipated is about to debut. So consider this our reminder to set your DVR, order a Season Pass, pop a fresh Memorex into the VCR… however it is you roll. This week, you’ll find seven returning shows (including Based on a True Story, Outlander and The Sex Lives of College Girls) and 10 series premieres (including Cruel Intentions, Dune: Prophecy and Interior Chinatown). Plus, a dozen shows head for hiatus (including the #OneChicago trifecta). A Christmas Story TV-movie premiere (CBS)9 pm Doctor Odyssey fall finale (ABC)9 pm Law & Order: SVU fall finale (NBC)9 pm The Real Housewives of Orange County Reunion Part 3 of 3 (Bravo)9 pm The Sex Lives of College Girls Season 3 premiere (Max)10 pm Found fall finale (NBC)10 pm Grey’s Anatomy fall finale (ABC) FRIDAY, NOV. 223 am Blitz movie premiere (Apple TV+)3 am Bread & Roses documentary premiere (Apple TV+)3 am Jim Gaffigan: The Skinny comedy special (Hulu)3 am Out of My Mind movie premiere (Disney+)3 am The Piano Lesson movie premiere (Netflix)3 am Pokémon Horizons: The Series Part 4 premiere (Netflix)8 pm Outlander Season 7B premiere (Starz)10 pm Real Time With Bill Maher Season 22 finale (HBO)11 pm It’s Florida, Man Season 1 finale (HBO) SATURDAY, NOV. 233 am Arcane series finale (Netflix) Want scoop on any of the above shows? html:
This weekly feature is in addition to TVLine’s daily What to Watch listings and our monthly breakdown of What’s on Streaming.

With over 500 scripted shows now airing across broadcast, cable and streaming, it’s easy to forget that a favorite comedy is returning, or that the new “prestige drama” you anticipated is about to debut. So consider this our reminder to set your DVR, order a Season Pass, pop a fresh Memorex into the VCR… however it is you roll.

This week, you’ll find seven returning shows (including Based on a True Story, Outlander and The Sex Lives of College Girls) and 10 series premieres (including Cruel Intentions, Dune: Prophecy and Interior Chinatown). Plus, a dozen shows head for hiatus (including the #OneChicago trifecta).

SUNDAY, NOV. 17
3 am Landman series premiere (Paramount+; first two episodes)
3 am Martin Scorsese Presents: The Saints docuseries premiere (Fox Nation)
3 am Tulsa King Season 2 finale (Paramount+)
9 pm Dune: Prophecy series premiere (HBO)
9 pm The Marlow Murder Club Season 1 finale (PBS)

MONDAY, NOV. 18
8 pm Leonardo Da Vinci docuseries premiere (PBS; first two episodes)
9 pm Rescue: HI-Surf fall finale (Fox)
10:30 pm The Making of Gladiator II special (CBS)

TUESDAY, NOV. 19
3 am The French Montana Story documentary premiere (Paramount+)
3 am Interior Chinatown series premiere (Hulu; all 10 episodes)
3 am Jeff Dunham’s Scrooged-Up Holiday Special (Prime Video)
3 am Making Manson docuseries premiere (Peacock; all three episodes)
8 pm Leonardo Da Vinci docuseries finale (PBS; last two episodes)
8 pm The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills Season 14 premiere (Bravo)
8:30 pm Night Court Season 3 premiere (NBC)
9 pm Dark Side of Reality TV Season 1 finale (Vice)
10 pm Defying Gravity: The Curtain Rises on Wicked special (NBC)

WEDNESDAY, NOV. 20
3 am The Merry Gentlemen movie premiere (Netflix)
3 am Our Oceans docuseries premiere (Netflix; all five episodes)
3 am Rhythm + Flow Season 2 premiere (Netflix; first four episodes)
3 am Wish List Games series premiere (Prime Video; first five episodes)
8 pm CMA Awards (ABC)
8 pm Chicago Med fall finale (NBC)
9 pm Chicago Fire fall finale (NBC)
10 pm Chicago P.D. fall finale (NBC)

THURSDAY, NOV. 21
3 am Based on a True Story Season 2 premiere (Peacock; all eight episodes)
3 am Cruel Intentions series premiere (Prime Video; all eight episodes)
3 am Man on the Inside series premiere (Netflix; all eight episodes)
8 pm 9-1-1 fall finale (ABC)
8 pm Law & Order fall finale (NBC)
8 pm Nugget Is Dead? A Christmas Story TV-movie premiere (CBS)
9 pm Doctor Odyssey fall finale (ABC)
9 pm Law & Order: SVU fall finale (NBC)
9 pm The Real Housewives of Orange County Reunion Part 3 of 3 (Bravo)
9 pm The Sex Lives of College Girls Season 3 premiere (Max)
10 pm Found fall finale (NBC)
10 pm Grey’s Anatomy fall finale (ABC)

FRIDAY, NOV. 22
3 am Blitz movie premiere (Apple TV+)
3 am Bread & Roses documentary premiere (Apple TV+)
3 am Jim Gaffigan: The Skinny comedy special (Hulu)
3 am Out of My Mind movie premiere (Disney+)
3 am The Piano Lesson movie premiere (Netflix)
3 am Pokémon Horizons: The Series Part 4 premiere (Netflix)
8 pm Outlander Season 7B premiere (Starz)
10 pm Real Time With Bill Maher Season 22 finale (HBO)
11 pm It’s Florida, Man Season 1 finale (HBO)

SATURDAY, NOV. 23
3 am Arcane series finale (Netflix)

Want scoop on any of the above shows? Email InsideLine@tvline.com and your question may be answered via Matt’s Inside Line.

2024 Christmas Movie Guide
